title: Im so curious as to what Urgot's skin concept will be...
body:
Riot said that between Aurelion Sol and Urgot, one of their skins will be a part of a pre-existing set.  The other will be a skin specifically thought up for the champ.  

Since Aurelion Sol got the mecha skin part of a pre-existing set, I'm really excited to see what they came up with for Urgot!

replies.body: *anarchy intensifies*
Ah, so each of his knees are going to shoot out one of those Guy Fawkes masks.

> [{quoted}](name=Warlord Dienekes,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=vRyYLQqJ,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2018-07-31T19:20:35.224+0000)
>
> Ah, so each of his knees are going to shoot out one of those Guy Fawkes masks.

I hope not. That means he won't be released until the 5th of November.

> [{quoted}](name=Warlord Dienekes,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=vRyYLQqJ,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2018-07-31T19:20:35.224+0000)
>
> Ah, so each of his knees are going to shoot out one of those Guy Fawkes masks.

Close, it will be a mask of Guy Fieri.
but without frosted tips
No, made exclusively out of frosted tips
I'm still laughing at this image. Thank you so much, I needed a good laugh today!
***fanboying intensifies***
Now hey hey, does this mean something like Chem-Baron Urgot? Similar in concept to Creator viktor where it takes place in a future where he has taken over?
Chembaron would be too similar to Chemtech, which is already an existing theme.

Doesnt mean it couldnt happen, it really depends on if they meant the “Lets make a new Urgot skin vs Lets make a new skin, Urgot seems like a good choice for this one.” So it still could be that they had a really good idea for a skin concept and thouht, hey, Urgot would fit in really well for this!
STAR QUEEN URGOT!!

> [{quoted}](name=Carnival Knights,realm=NA,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=vRyYLQqJ,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2018-07-31T18:50:02.987+0000)
>
> *anarchy intensifies*

Resistance Urgot.
E X C I T E D
Wait, does that mean it can't be Star Guardian Urgot?

> [{quoted}](name=DerMangoJoghurt,realm=EUW,application-id=6kFXY1kR,discussion-id=vRyYLQqJ,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2018-07-31T17:19:21.565+0000)
>
> Wait, does that mean it can't be Star Guardian Urgot?

No. This skin will never exist. There is a possibility of something like "Definitely not SG Urgot" for April Fool's, but there. WILL. NEVER. BE. STAR GUARDIAN URGOT.

It will completely ruin the skin line with his ludicrous inclusion, and there's not way thematically to fit him at all into the line up. Maybe as a villain, but NEVER as one of the Guardians.

Galactic Knight / Super Galaxy / Ancient Star Knight Urgot, Sion, Braum, Mordekaiser, and Nautilus.

Sure, he's not a magical girl. But if you think including him is impossible, you are _seriously_ underestimating anime.
I really like you though of process, "Ancient star knight" has so much f*cking potential when you say it like this.

Right? Imagine the little anime video Riot would make. The Star Guardians, cornered by Dark Star Cho'gath, and then you hear this sound like a jet screaming in. Next thing you know, a comet slams into Cho, and the flames swirl away to reveal gleaming ram-themed armor and a gigantic axe: Ancient Star Knight Sion has returned.

Then you just base the looks of the different knights on Zodiac symbols. Sion gets Aries, Urgot gets Cancer (the Crab! It's funny TWICE), Nautilus gets Aquarius, and so on.
I do like your train of thought, there are plenty of star/space themes skin lines and the only big guys that are really psrt of them are Cho’Gath, Gnar, and Darius. Sort of J4 but he isnt very big.

Honestly yes, Nautilus needs a new skin that doesnt look like trash after that disgrace of a thing with a green mullet he got just over a year ago. Sadly no Braum skin for a while with his new Mafia skin unless they give him the Master Yi treatment of 2 skins within 3 months. Urgot Sion and Morde all need skins, and putting them into one line would be awesome. Honestly I would like super Galaxy or Dark star for Urgot, but more than that i want his skin to be a legendary.

Right, that was just me listing off "big guys" of the League. Braum is interchangeable with other big guys in that regard, like Shen or Malphite (though I do think because of his animations, Braum would be a good candidate for some kind of celestial skin. Imagine his shield having two or three different constellations that it displays when he uses W, for example).
Of course not, that's just a joke in the community that started before his rework.
Yep.
So first Star Urgot confirmed?
Yes

How about Rapgot. With each shot gun knee shot, he'll drop different hot bars. When he flips you he'll spit even more hot bars. When he uses his W, he starts rapping so fast, as fast as his minigun could shoot. And when he uses his execute on you, he'll drop the sickest finishing line while sucking you in just to add insult to injury.
I hate rap and I want that skin :\
Pretty sure it’s something along the lines of “Dead Alpha”.
Burgot together with Flying Spaghetti Monster Vel'Koz and French Fry Fiddlesticks. Legends say these three eldergods from the food dimension come to feast on all of humanity.
Dead Boss/Alpha Urgot... it better be worth the wait.
What?
There was a “Leak” a while back that teased a whole slew of skins, Urgot and Sion were teased as Dead Alpha, opponents for the Omega Squad

Link me?

I like looking at leaks real or fake.
https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/general-discussion/kbqHR9YX-someone-earlier-apparantly-leaked-the-next-upcoming-skins?show=flat&page=2
Thx!
No problemo my friendo
That leak also said that Aurelion Sol would get a Magnificent Dragon skin placed in the same universe as the Immortal Journey skins, which is already debunked.
Dead Alpha, Battle-Boss, Dark Star, Super Galaxy, Chem-Baron, Dreadnova. Hell, if it is long enough it could even be a halloween skin, although I personally dont want that kind of wait.
its specific for him so it cant be dark star, battle boss, super galaxy or dread nova. Chem-baron is questionable as it could fall in line with chem tech

Thats sort of what I figure, but it could be that with sol and urgot they were talkin about the “Lets make a new skin for Urgot vs. Lets make a new skin for this set, who would fot well?” Type of deal. With Sol it was likely a “Lets make a new Sol skin” so depending on what they meant in the post it very well could be a “We are making more of skin line, who fits well” type of idea. But frankly I am fine with either. Also, Mafia Urgot would have been neat.

I doubt they would make it a Halloween skin. Having him go so long without a skin and then making it limited time only would be a problem especially since Riot has stated in the past they don't like making new champions (which reworked urgot basically is) have their first skin be a limited edition one.
It better be Star Guardian Urgot
Surprise party urgot maybe, it would look funny and cool
Dead Alpha Urgot it seems
That leak is fake because Sol skin from it was fake.
Probably Darkstar, Cosmic or Mecha, cause that's what they do if they have to give a champ that's not Lux a skin.

They already said that either urgot or Aurelion Sol would get a skin that doesn't belong to an existing skinline and since Sol is getting the mechaskin it means that Urgot will get one for a new skinline.

Depends on how you read it. It could be that they are saying Sol and Urgot both get a skin, one from an existing line, one from a new one. OR it could be read as “Lets make a new Sol skin vs. Hey we have this cool idea for a skin, I think sol would fit really well into it.” I find it likely that it would be the latter. At least to me it seems like Urgot will have a skin that is part of a set, mind you it still could be a new set, but I believe it is likely that there will be accompanying skins coming with him. TLDR: It couls be that they thougt of a cool skin concept and thought Urgot would be a good fit, depends on how you interpret the “One of each”.
Ah ok,thanks for clarifying that.
